pages.text: $(li)The Bamboo Spikes is a useful block that it will damage creatures that are standing.$(br)$(li)It will deal more damage if it's pointing upwards and a creature it falling throught it.
$(li)Creatures will also be slowed by it. If the block is pointing upwards you can negate its damage by shifting.

$(li)You can combine the Bamboo Spikes with any Lingering Potion either via Crafting or by right clicking with said item and it will convert into a tipped bamboo spikes.$(br)$(li)Tipped bamboo spikes will always have 15 poison charges to begin which will get consumed once and entity walks on top of the block, receiving the poison status effect for 6 seconds.
$(li)You can charge them back with dispensers and can be easily automated since they will only make observers pulse once they get fully depleted.
